"Cancer Warriors Run": Organize a global running event where participants run a marathon or a shorter distance in their locality to raise funds for cancer research. Participants can register online and collect pledges for each kilometer they complete. This event can be held on a single day or over a period of several weeks. Confidence Score: 0.8/1

"Cancer Smartphone App": Develop a mobile app that allows users to track their daily physical activity, monitor their diet, and connect with other cancer survivors and supporters. The app can also provide educational resources and offer personalized recommendations for cancer prevention and treatment. Confidence Score: 0.9/1

"Pink Ribbon Parade": Organize a parade in major cities around the world where participants can show their support for cancer research by wearing pink clothing or accessories. The parade can feature floats, marching bands, and special performances. Confidence Score: 0.8/1

"Cancer Art Project": Collaborate with artists from around the world to create a series of artworks that represent the journey of cancer patients. These artworks can be exhibited in a traveling exhibition that raises funds for cancer research. Confidence Score: 0.9/1

"Cancer Cook-Off": Host a cooking competition where professional chefs and amateur cooks can showcase their culinary skills by creating dishes that are inspired by the flavors and ingredients of different cultures. The event can be held in a single location or broadcast live online. Confidence Score: 0.8/1
